featured.text: It will be made of timber as an ecological symbol of “the right to a dignified life on a protected Earth,” said architects Normier, Henni and Lelievre, who were also responsible for the Europe section at the Seville exhibition.
In ecological terms, the chemicals of living things are borrowed from the Earth, and at death they return.

definition.zh_def: 生態的；與生態學有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to or concerned with the relation of living organisms to one another and to their physical surroundings.
definition.example: The ecological balance of the forest is crucial for the survival of many species.
